con:request.name: AddCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature>\r <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr2:CardNumber>\r <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard>\r <acr2:TaxExempt>false</acr2:TaxExempt>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: AddCardToken (Id)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}${CardLastFour}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature>\r <acr2:TokenId>TOKN${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr2:TokenId>\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr2:CardNumber>\r <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard>\r <acr2:TaxExempt>false</acr2:TaxExempt>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: GenerateCryptoToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:GenerateCryptoToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr2:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/> <acr2:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/> <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate> <acr2:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr2:CardNumber> <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber> <acr2:MultiMerchantToken>false</acr2:MultiMerchantToken> <acr2:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard> </tem:request> </tem:GenerateCryptoToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: GenerateCryptoToken (MM)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:GenerateCryptoToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr2:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr2:CardNumber>\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr2:MultiMerchantToken>true</acr2:MultiMerchantToken> <acr2:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:GenerateCryptoToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Sale
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:UseToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:UseToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ModifyCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ModifyCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>123 Races Rd</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmailFake}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode>12345</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr2:TokenId>\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate>1230</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:NameOnCard>Jon Star</acr2:NameOnCard>\r <acr2:TaxExempt>true</acr2:TaxExempt>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ModifyCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ModifyCardToken (Id)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ModifyCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>123 Races Rd</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}${CardLastFour}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmailFake}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode>12345</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TokenId>${AddCardToken (Id)#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr2:TokenId>\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate>1230</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:NameOnCard>Jon Star</acr2:NameOnCard>\r <acr2:TaxExempt>true</acr2:TaxExempt>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ModifyCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: UseToken (Modified) - Sale
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:UseToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:UseToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: GetToken - By Card
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:GetToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr1:CardNumber>\r <acr1:CustomerCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:EmailAddress xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IncludeMultipleMerchants>false</acr1:IncludeMultipleMerchants>\r <acr1:IncludeSignature>false</acr1:IncludeSignature>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:GetToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: GetToken - By Last Four
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:GetToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr1:CardNumber>\r <acr1:CustomerCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:EmailAddress xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IncludeMultipleMerchants>false</acr1:IncludeMultipleMerchants>\r <acr1:IncludeSignature>false</acr1:IncludeSignature>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:GetToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ValidateCard (All)

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ValidateCard>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr2:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr2:CardNumber>\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ValidateCard>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ValidateCard (CVV & ZIP)

con:request.name: DeleteCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:DeleteCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:DeleteCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: DeleteCardToken (Id)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:DeleteCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken (Id)#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:DeleteCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Copy of AddCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>mustpassover</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>121${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>4545${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature>\r <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber></acr2:CardNumber>\r <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MagneticData>${MagneticData}</acr2:MagneticData>\r <acr2:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard>\r <acr2:TaxExempt>false</acr2:TaxExempt>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
